entry.title: Fantastic App
entry.content:
Great for creating memes or just whatever you want to do.
The one thing I'd like to see is fully solid shapes instead of semi-transparent and a wider choice of basic shape options including rectangles.

Fantastic App

Great for creating memes or just whatever you want to do.

The one thing I'd like to see is fully solid shapes instead of semi-transparent and a wider choice of basic shape options including rectangles.

entry.title: Update needs some fixing
entry.content: There's some glitches in the app - like the crop tool doesn't work. I preferred the old way of applying multiple filters as you could change the levels of them afterwards, but it's still a good app.

Update needs some fixing

There's some glitches in the app - like the crop tool doesn't work. I preferred the old way of applying multiple filters as you could change the levels of them afterwards, but it's still a good app.

entry.title: Fantastic app
entry.content: I have another version that I use often on my Mac. What's great about this app is that you can apply filters and make collages. There is an abundance of filters and other editing styles that can turn a boring phone photo into something much more inviting! Would definitely recommend!

Fantastic app

I have another version that I use often on my Mac.
What's great about this app is that you can apply filters and make collages.
There is an abundance of filters and other editing styles that can turn a boring phone photo into something much more inviting!
Would definitely recommend!

entry.title: Great app. One suggestion
